com.emc.vipr.client.impl.jersey

Class LoggingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
      • com.emc.vipr.client.impl.jersey.LoggingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientHandler

    public class LoggingFilter
extends com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
    Filter to log input/output to our log file. This is based on the Jersey LoggingFilter with some differences:
    • Logs to slf4j
    • Does not include headers (so no tokens/passwords)
    • Includes timing information
    • Has a maximum length for entities (Prevents performance degradation)
